blog.title: Britannia announces highest dividend payout in 3 years at Rs 72/share
blog.des: Common topics for news reports include war, government, politics, education, health, the environment, economy, business, fashion, entertainment, and sport, as well as quirky or unusual events. Government
blog.s_des: proclamations, concerning royal ceremonies, laws, taxes, public health, and criminals, have been dubbed news since ancient times. Technological and social developments, often driven by government

blog.title: We are the champions
blog.des: 'Sport' means all forms of physical activity which, through casual or organised participation, aim at expressing or improving
blog.s_des: physical fitness and mental wellbeing, forming social relationships or obtaining results in competition at all levels.

blog.title: DON’T choose a subject that is way too broad.
blog.des: This is a mistake made by many students that leads them to lose marks for content. When you write on a general
blog.s_des: subject, such as “modern technology” or “computer history”, it can be hard to demonstrate the required depth and analysis.
